title: Regulating Facebook and Google Pt 3: Tyler Cowen Rebuttals
description: In part three of our series investigating how digital platforms like Facebook and Google should be regulated, Tyler Cowen from George Mason University argues to Kate and Luigi that more regulation may not be the answer to all our questions about digital platforms.
author: uchicagopodcasts@gmail.com (Chicago Booth Review)
content:encoded: In part three of our series investigating how digital platforms like Facebook and Google should be regulated, Tyler Cowen from George Mason University argues to Kate and Luigi that more regulation may not be the answer to all our questions about digital platforms.
